trans-unit.source: Send a Command/Query to an Instrument/Device through the VISA interface (GPIB / TCP)

seg-source.mrk: Send a Command/Query to an Instrument/Device through the VISA interface (GPIB / TCP)

target.mrk: Send a Command/Query to an Instrument/Device through the VISA interface (GPIB / TCP)

trans-unit.source: RETURNS an array of the VISA resource descriptors of the instruments that were found in the GPIB bus (see the Remarks of the _viExecCommand() for more info)

seg-source.mrk: RETURNS an array of the VISA resource descriptors of the instruments that were found in the GPIB bus (see the Remarks of the _viExecCommand() for more info)

target.mrk: RETURNS an array of the VISA resource descriptors of the instruments that were found in the GPIB bus (see the Remarks of the _viExecCommand() for more info)

trans-unit.source: RETURNS an array of the IDNs (i.e names) of the instruments that were found in the GPIB bus

seg-source.mrk: RETURNS an array of the IDNs (i.e names) of the instruments that were found in the GPIB bus

target.mrk: RETURNS an array of the IDNs (i.e names) of the instruments that were found in the GPIB bus

trans-unit.source: [optional] If 1 a message box showing the results of the search will be shown.

seg-source.mrk: If 1 a message box showing the results of the search will be shown.

target.mrk: If 1 a message box showing the results of the search will be shown.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0, which means that the results are not shown

seg-source.mrk: The default is 0, which means that the results are not shown

target.mrk: The default is 0, which means that the results are not shown

trans-unit.source: the number of instruments found (0 or more).

seg-source.mrk: the number of instruments found (0 or more).

target.mrk: the number of instruments found (0 or more).

trans-unit.source: a NEGATIVE value and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

seg-source.mrk: a NEGATIVE value and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

target.mrk: a NEGATIVE value and sets the @error flag to non-zero.

trans-unit.source: As for all the VISA functions the VISA libraries must be installed (you can check whether visa32.dll is in {WINDOWS}\system32) and a GPIB card (such as a National Instruments NI PCI-GPIB card or an Agilent 82350B PCI High-Performance GPIB card) must be installed

seg-source.mrk: As for all the VISA functions the VISA libraries must be installed (you can check whether visa32.dll is in {WINDOWS}\system32) and a GPIB card (such as a National Instruments NI PCI-GPIB card or an Agilent 82350B PCI High-Performance GPIB card) must be installed

target.mrk: As for all the VISA functions the VISA libraries must be installed (you can check whether visa32.dll is in {WINDOWS}\system32) and a GPIB card (such as a National Instruments NI PCI-GPIB card or an Agilent 82350B PCI High-Performance GPIB card) must be installed

trans-unit.source: * For a detailed description of the most common VISA DESCRIPTORS look at the Remarks of the help on the _viExecCommand() function

seg-source.mrk: * For a detailed description of the most common VISA DESCRIPTORS look at the Remarks of the help on the _viExecCommand() function

target.mrk: * For a detailed description of the most common VISA DESCRIPTORS look at the Remarks of the help on the _viExecCommand() function

trans-unit.source: This example performs a search on the GPIB bus and shows the results in a MsgBox

seg-source.mrk: This example performs a search on the GPIB bus and shows the results in a MsgBox

target.mrk: This example performs a search on the GPIB bus and shows the results in a MsgBox
